actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-740.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 5507 to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the requirement that States reduce the amount of unemployment compensation payable for any week by the amount of certain retirement benefits, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5507 (Unemployment compensation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 5507 to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the requirement that States reduce the amount of unemployment compensation payable for any week by the amount of certain retirement benefits, and for other purposes.
